text: The Eliminator match of the 2024 Major League Cricket will be played between MI New York and Texas Super Kings on Thursday, July 25, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas. Texas Super Kings finished third on the points table, while MI New York finished fourth with equal points to Los Angeles Knight Riders but a superior net run rate. The match will start at 6 AM IST and will be broadcast on Sony Sports Ten 1 SD & HD TV channels in India, with live streaming available on the Jio Cinema app and website.

The tournament has reached its final stages, with four teams remaining in contention. The Eliminator match will feature Texas Super Kings vs MI New York, while the Qualifier match will be between Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns on July 26 at 6:00 AM IST at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas. The winner of the Qualifier will face the winner of the Challenger in the final match. In their previous meeting, San Francisco Unicorns defeated Washington Freedom by 6 wickets (DLS) in match 20 of the MLC 2024. The Qualifier match will be telecast live on Sony Sports Ten 1 SD & HD TV channels in India and streamed live on the Jio Cinema app and website.

**Match Details:**

* The next match in the MLC 2024 tournament is between Texas Super Kings and Seattle Orcas.
* The match will be played at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium on July 24, starting at 6:00 AM IST (Indian Standard Time).

**Broadcast and Streaming:**

* Sony Sports Network is the official broadcast partner of MLC 2024 in India.
* The Texas Super Kings vs Seattle Orcas match will be live telecast on Sony Sports Ten TV channels.
* Fans in India can also watch the match online on the JioCinema app and website.

**Seattle Orcas' Performance:**

* The Seattle Orcas have registered only one win in the tournament so far, which was against the LA Knight Riders in game six.
* They have lost four games in a row and will be looking to finish high in the group stage despite losing a playoff berth.

**Match Result:** Texas Super Kings won by 37 runs against Seattle Orcas in the final league match of the Cognizant Major League Cricket 2024.

**Score:** Texas Super Kings scored 177/8 in 20 overs, while Seattle Orcas scored 140/9 in 20 overs.

**Key Performance:** Calvin Savage's all-round performance was instrumental in Texas Super Kings' comprehensive win.

**Match Details:** The match was played on July 24, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas. Seattle Orcas won the toss and elected to bowl.

**Teams:** The playing XIs for the match were: Texas Super Kings (Faf du Plessis, captain) and Seattle Orcas (Heinrich Klaasen, captain).

**Tournament Status:** The MLC 2024 season has reached its playoff stage, with the final four teams already decided.

**Final Four Teams:** The top four teams that will feature in the MLC 2024 knockouts are:
1. Washington Freedom (WAF)
2. San Francisco Unicorns (SFU)
3. Texas Super Kings (TSK)
4. MI New York (MINY)

**Playoff Schedule:**
1. Eliminator: TSK vs MINY on July 25 at 6 AM IST at Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas
2. Qualifier: WAF vs SFU on July 26 at 6 AM IST at Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas
3. Challenger: Winner of Eliminator vs Loser of Qualifier on July 27 at 6 AM IST at Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas
4. Final: Winner of Qualifier vs Winner of Challenger on July 29 at 6 AM IST at Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas

**Recent Match Result:** In the last group-stage match, SFU defeated WAF by six wickets (DLS) in a rain-marred match on July 23. Sanjay Krishnamurthi scored 79 runs off 42 balls, and Josh Inglis scored 45 runs off 17 balls to help SFU chase the target of 177 runs in 14 overs.

* The Texas Super Kings defeated the Seattle Orcas by 37 runs in the final league match of the Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024 at Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas.
* Calvin Savage's all-round performance led the Texas Super Kings to victory, with his unbeaten 45 off 27 balls helping his team reach 177/8 in the first innings.
* The Seattle Orcas struggled in their run chase, with Quinton de Kock and Shehan Jayasuriya providing a solid start, but ultimately falling short, finishing at 140/9.
* Ottneil Bartmann (3/20), Noor Ahmad (2/19), and Calvin Savage (2/23) were the key bowlers for the Texas Super Kings, dismantling the Seattle Orcas' batting lineup.
* The Texas Super Kings finished the league stage with three wins and two losses (two no results), while the Seattle Orcas ended with six losses and a sole victory.
* The Texas Super Kings will play MI New York in the eliminator match.

**Match Information**: The Eliminator match of the Major League Cricket tournament will be played between Texas Super Kings and MI New York on July 24th at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas.

**Team Standings**: Texas Super Kings finished 3rd and MI New York finished 4th in the points table after the league stages.

**Texas Super Kings**: 

* Top run scorer: Faf du Plessis (303 runs)
* Top wicket taker: Marcus Stoinis (6 wickets)
* Won their previous match against Seattle Orcas by 37 runs, with Faf du Plessis scoring 39 and Calvin Savage scoring 45.

**MI New York**:

* Top run scorer: Nicholas Pooran (172 runs)
* Top wicket taker: Rashid Khan (10 wickets)
* Won their previous match against LA Knight Riders by 4 wickets, with Nicholas Pooran scoring 35 and Rashid Khan taking 3 wickets.

Both teams are gearing up for the Eliminator match, and the article provides an overview of their current form and performances in the tournament so far.

* Two players, Rashid Khan and Haris Rauf, will be participating in the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament, forcing their respective teams in other leagues to find short-term replacements.
* Chris Green will replace Rashid Khan at Trent Rockets, while Josh Little will replace Haris Rauf at Welsh Fire for their opening match.

**Match Result:** Texas Super Kings secured two more points and will head into the playoffs after defeating Seattle Orcas.

**Upcoming Match:** The Eliminator match will take place on Thursday, July 25th, where Texas Super Kings will face MI New York for a spot in the Qualifier.

**Player of the Match:** Calvin Savage for his outstanding all-round performance, including an unbeaten 45 off 27 balls and two wickets.

**Match Highlights:**

* Texas Super Kings batsmen struggled early on, but Calvin Savage's blistering innings helped them reach a competitive total of 177 runs.
* Ottneil Baartman took 3 wickets for 20 runs, while Calvin Savage and Noor Ahmad chipped in with two wickets each to restrict Seattle Orcas.
* Seattle Orcas struggled to chase the target, with Heinrich Klaasen failing to make an impact and Ottneil Baartman taking early wickets to put pressure on the batters.

**Quotes:**

* Faf du Plessis (Texas Super Kings captain): "It was important for a few guys to get time in the middle... We focused on getting the small things right heading into the big Eliminator."
* Heinrich Klaasen (Seattle Orcas captain): "It has been a tough and difficult season for us... We can make some investments in a couple of players and hope to reset and re-focus for the next season."
* Calvin Savage (Player of the Match): "It was good fun after having put in so much hard work... I tried to keep things simple in the middle and stay positive, and it paid well for me with the bat."

* The San Francisco Unicorns secured their place in the Qualifier match of the MLC 2024 tournament by defeating the Washington Freedom.
* The Unicorns were set a revised target of 177 runs in 14 overs under the DLS method.
* Hassam Khan played a match-winning cameo of 32 runs off 11 balls, including four boundaries and two sixes, to help the Unicorns chase down the target.
* Sanjay Krishnamurthi (79*) and Josh Inglis (45) also contributed to the Unicorns' win with aggressive knocks.
* The Unicorns will face Washington Freedom again in the Qualifier match scheduled for July 25th.

* The tournament is scheduled to take place from July 22 to July 26, 2024.
* The teams participating in the tournament are:
	+ Los Angeles Knight Riders
	+ MI New York
	+ San Francisco Unicorns
	+ Washington Freedom
	+ Texas Super Kings
	+ Seattle Orcas
* The matches will be broadcast live on Sony Sports Ten 5 SD & HD.
* The schedule of the matches is as follows:
	+ July 22: Los Angeles Knight Riders vs. MI New York
	+ July 23: San Francisco Unicorns vs. Washington Freedom
	+ July 24: Texas Super Kings vs. Seattle Orcas
	+ July 25: Eliminator (3 v 4)
	+ July 26: Qualifier (1 v 2)
	+ July 27: Challenger

Note that the article does not provide any information about the format of the tournament, the number of teams, or the prize money.

**Match Information**: The Washington Freedom will face the San Francisco Unicorns in a Qualifier match of the Major League Cricket 2024 tournament on July 26, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Team Performance**: The Washington Freedom have been the standout team in the tournament so far, winning 5 out of their 6 matches, while the San Francisco Unicorns have also had a strong tournament, winning 4 out of their 6 matches.

**Pitch and Weather Report**: The Grand Prairie Stadium is known for its batting-friendly pitch and fast outfield, and the weather is expected to be clear with no chances of rain.

**Predicted Playing XIs**: The predicted playing XIs for the match are:

Washington Freedom: Steven Smith, Akhilesh Reddy, Jack Edwards, Andris Gous, Travis Head, Lahiru Milantha, Glenn Maxwell, Rachin Ravindra, Marco Jansen, Akeal Hosein, Lockie Ferguson

San Francisco Unicorns: Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Jahmar Hamilton, Josh Inglis, Sherfane Rutherford, Matthew Short, Corey Anderson, Pat Cummins, Haris Rauf, Hassan Khan, Matt Henry

**Match Prediction**: Based on the squad strength, the Washington Freedom are favored to win the game.

The MLC 2024 season is nearing its climax, with four teams advancing to the knockout stage: Washington Freedom, San Francisco Unicorns, Texas Super Kings, and MI New York. The playoffs format is similar to the Indian Premier League (IPL), with an Eliminator match between the 3rd and 4th placed teams, a Qualifier match between the top 2 teams, and a Challenger match between the winner of the Eliminator and the loser of the Qualifier. The winners of the Qualifier and Challenger matches will advance to the MLC 2024 Final. The schedule for the knockout stage is as follows:

* Eliminator: Texas Super Kings vs MI New York on July 25th
* Qualifier: Washington Freedom vs San Francisco Unicorns on July 26th
* Challenger: Winner of Eliminator vs Loser of Qualifier on July 27th

All matches will be played at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium, with start times at 6 A.M Indian Standard Time (IST).

**Match Details**
The 20th match of the MLC 2024 tournament will be played between the Texas and Seattle teams on July 24th at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium in Dallas, with the match commencing at 6:00 AM IST.

**Team Standings**
Texas is currently in third position with two wins from six matches, while Seattle is at the bottom of the standings with only one win from six matches.

**Match Preview**
The match is crucial for both teams, as Texas aims to build momentum and climb up the table, while Seattle needs to overcome their difficulties to avoid a demoralizing defeat.

**Head-to-Head Record**
No head-to-head record is mentioned in the article.

**Predicted Playing 11s**
The predicted playing 11s for each team are listed in the article, including notable players such as Faf du Plessis, Quinton de Kock, and Marcus Stoinis.

The article provides fantasy cricket tips, including captaincy picks, top picks, budget picks, and vice-captain choices, as well as two Dream11 prediction teams.

The article is about Match 21 of the Major League Cricket tournament, which is scheduled to be played between TEX (Texas Super Kings) and SEA (Seattle Orcas). The article promises to provide information on player battles, player records, and head-to-head records for the upcoming match between these two teams.

**Match Details:** The 21st match of the 2024 Major League Cricket tournament will be played between Texas Super Kings and Seattle Orcas at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas on July 23rd, 2024, starting at 20:30 local time.

**Pitch Report:** The pitch is expected to be batter-friendly with the ball carrying through at a good pace, similar to the previous game where over 350 runs were scored.

**Team Previews:**

* **Texas Super Kings:** Despite a 42-run defeat to Washington Freedom, they are guaranteed to finish third in the group stage. They have a strong batting lineup with Faf du Plessis, Devon Conway, Aaron Hardie, and Marcus Stoinis. The bowling department will rely on Mohammad Mohsin, Noor Ahmed, and Dwayne Bravo to contain the opposition.
* **Seattle Orcas:** They have been convincingly defeated in their last few matches and are already out of contention for the playoffs. They will rely on Ryan Rickelton, Quinton de Kock, and Heinrich Klaasen to score runs, while Cameron Gannon has been their most consistent bowler.

**Predicted Playing 11:**

* Texas Super Kings: Devon Conway (wk), Faf du Plessis (c), Aaron Hardie, Joshua Trump, Marcus Stoinis, Milind Kumar, Calvin Savage, Dwayne Bravo, Mohammad Mohsin, Noor Ahmad, Zia-ul-Haq
* Seattle Orcas: Ryan Rickelton, Aaron Jones, Quinton de Kock (wk), Shehan Jayasuriya, Heinrich Klaasen, Michael Bracewell, Harmeet Singh, Keemo Paul, Cameron Gannon, Lungi Ngidi, Ali Sheikh
